level.heading: Confirmation of receipt of application and voted ballot.
level.text: The Board shall implement an electronic free-access system by which a covered voter may determine by telephone, electronic mail, or Internet whether:
The voter's federal postcard application or other registration or military-overseas ballot application has been received and accepted; and
The voter's military-overseas ballot has been received and the current status of the ballot.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-137
level.text: For history of Law 19-137, see notes under ยง 1-1061.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 14 of the Uniform Military and Overseas Voters Act.
